tweets.content: GENZs MUST Be Stopped from Using Social Media to Fight For Justice!!NIS Boss Noordin Haji Vows!

Nobody has and will ever forget

I could be living my life like this spending less time on X but then cushitic pieces of shit Mohammed Amin and Noordin Haji decided to hunt me down on nonsensical bullshit all because I’m Kikuyu and it’s the tribe they were antagonizing because of their choreographed beefs with

The Director General of the National Intelligence Service (NIS), Mr. Noordin Haji, has addressed a matter of fundamental importance to the preservation of national stability and the integrity of democratic governance.

Many Kenyans continue to misunderstand the intention behind

I commend the firm and focused stance taken by the Director General of the National Intelligence Service, Mr. Noordin Haji, during the Mashariki Conference, particularly on the urgent threat posed by disinformation, misinformation, and propaganda. His message is timely and

Noordin Haji MUST know that we are not scared of dead snakes

We have freedom of speech, expression and of mass media

Do not call criticism a threat to national security

The only threat to national security is Haji, Ruto and fellow abductors

We will not be cowed

NIS DG Noordin Haji raised concerns about the impact of misinformation online, eroding public trust and deepening divisions. He called for coordinated strategies among African nations to address these digital threats urgently.
